website_summaries.verdict: A sharp-looking 150 watt, 2-speed, handheld blender that includes a table stand and dry grinder.
pros: Bamix's Deluxe M150 comes with a convenient dry grinder that can be used for seeds, nuts, coffee beans, spices, and more
Additionally, this model is the only one on our shortlist that comes with a table stand instead of a wall mount
cons: Rarely, a model can slip through quality control that isn't as durable as expected

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I previously owned a Bamix immersion blender, but it broke. I then switched to a Kitchen Aid- but not a fan. Due to the fact that I use this tool frequently, I decided to purchase this one. So glad I did! Not even a comparison, and I love the different blades and stand that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M. Corah

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: So far this works like a charm! All previous attempts at making mayo with my food processor failed, but with this unit I had amazing homemade mayo in 15 seconds! My cream of broccoli soup is so fun to make now -- no transferring hot liquid to my food processor and then back into the pot. I wouldn't have paid so much for this if it hadn't been for Gordon Ramsey's YouTube video, but now I know why he was so impressed with his Bamix. I'm impressed with my Bamix, too.
customer_reviews.author: Home Cook

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Bamix
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Bamix. I've tested it in salad dressing, mashed potatoes, whipped cream, soup, chopping veggies, and making homemade laundry stain remover and it did the jobs superbly, in seconds, and very quietly. I've got a lot more things to use it for but couldn't wait to give my review. It's so well made and sturdy, I'm sure I'll be using it for years. It will make a great gift to leave to my daughter, the baker. I thank those who left informative and honest reviews; they're most valuable toward making good purchases.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Stern

customer_reviews.title: This is the immersion mixer of my dreams
customer_reviews.text: My favorite use of the Bamix is tuna salad. I flake the tuna using the Bamix, which is so easy. I mix in the yolk of a hard boiled egg, and the mayo, also using the Bamix, and finally add relish, and the chopped hard boiled eggs, and chopped celery. The taste of the tuna when it is so well flaked is delish. It's quick and easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: What I would call a middle of the road blender, nothing special! But I did find the little grinder container handy to regrind my spices. As I find most spices way to big, which causes them to fall off during cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: My favorite kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Bamix blenders for about 25 years! I bought my first one at the State Fair, and that one is now being used by my son! This model had some cool new features, so I upgraded! I use the Bamix for quick mixing tasks, chopping nuts, making lump-free gravy, and quickly making baby food for my granddaughter. It is quick and easy to clean. Now my daughter is asking for one, too!
customer_reviews.author: Katie O

customer_reviews.title: Long time Bamix Customer
customer_reviews.text: Love this Bamix! After a couple moves, my old Bamix hand mixer disappeared (had for a good 15-years) and I just couldn't do without it any longer! Purchased this unit and have been so happy for quick and easy smoothies and sauces! The stand is a nice addition - I keep it in quick reach on the countertop. I prefer the Bamix over other models on the market mostly due to its smaller profile and easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Everything Amazon

customer_reviews.title: The last one you'll ever buy
customer_reviews.text: Forget the plastic consumer grade products. This one is a monster and can handle anything. Heavy and solid, built the way things should be - to last a lifetime. Worth every $.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife this last Christmas. I usually wont buy kitchen gadgets. Made that mistake once, many years ago. But i took a chance, because she had mention that she would love one. To make a long story short she really love this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the power of this blender and how easy it is to use and clean. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment 🙁
customer_reviews.text: This product was a huge disappointment! Not easy to use or clean. It’s also heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Durable and long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: I love the power of this hand mixer to be able to use it in every day cooking. It is easy to operate, easy to clean, very very durable. It is my second band mix blender my first one I had for her 12 years .Are use it for a lot of things are use it for making smoothies are use it for making soups are use it for making peanut butter I love it everyone should have one!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My last one identical to this one lasted 20 years and I'm looking forward to having it that long.....and I'm 80 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Norma T.

customer_reviews.title: Bamix Deluxe M150 - 150 Watt 2 Speed 3 Blade...
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bamix, it does everything it promises to do and more. It is very easy to use, clean and store. All in all, perfect for a small kitchen to work and feel like a large one. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: BCAllyCat

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this blender. I love how easy and quick I can cream soups in the pot. It cuts down on the mess created transfering soup to food processor. It’s small size makes it easy to store when not in use. I use to have a large counter blender. I don’t miss it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Gordon

customer_reviews.title: For the size it is great.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Use it often, wish it had more power. For the size it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Bmag

customer_reviews.title: You will NOT regret getting this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, and super easy to clean!!!! Making me wanna toss my KitchenAid Standing Blender.....
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Chen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised and works great recommended it to a couple of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Malia

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: It was a housewarming gift for a foodie couple and they are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Horseman 46

customer_reviews.title: It’s an excellent product in performance and quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a must have for every kitchen. It’s an excellent product in performance and quality. Also recommend the additional Bamix Immersion Blender Blade – Meat.
customer_reviews.author: B&LK

customer_reviews.title: peeling plating
customer_reviews.text: chromium plated part peeled into my food within 30 days of using. my time to return is over so I am out $250
customer_reviews.author: jjj8

customer_reviews.title: I gave it one star because I absolutely love the plastic grinder
customer_reviews.text: Not up to my expectations, the blades don't do what's expected based on its advertising....I gave it one star because I absolutely love the plastic grinder. I've grinder everything from salt, oatmeal, herbs, spices and even cinnamon sticks which stained and didn't grind to well, however I still use the cinnamon and slowly by reusing the grinder the stain of the cinnamon is fading. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Poor design and quality
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work as well as the Cuisinard that is $40. Blade is too small to even mix up soup. Poor design and quality. should not be sold on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this version of the blender as it came with several attachments and a nice black stand. The units are, with the exception of the long neck Gastro, virtually identical. Thus the choice is what attachments you want and perhaps the color of the unit. As you would expect from the inventor of the hand blender, the quality, durability, and ease of use outshine any other blender on the market. We had a Braun for many years and it was excellent but if you are making squash soup or some other dish that has pithy ingredients, this unit will give you the power and speed to purée the ingredients to the smoothest consistency. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Brassman123

customer_reviews.title: Impressive mixer with respect to power and comfort within the hand.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate its power and the way it fits into my hand. The clear plastic container is wonderful for grating cheese and grinding nuts. However, two years later, the "shoulders' of the table stand broke off. I have purchased 5 others for gifts. Their stands have not broken. Yet. I hope Bamix (or AMEX's buyer warranty) replaces the plastic stand.
customer_reviews.author: DustyCamel

customer_reviews.title: 27 years ago I bought my first Bamix/ Amazon just shipped my new one to me today
customer_reviews.text: Same fabulous product I came to know well enough to use in everyday kitchen projects easy clean easy hang up easy to use all the time. I am very pleased this time no one uses it but ME. The last one was dropped by a drunk neighbor and it has issues/ She dropped it from a height of 12 feet. Yes I have always wondered anyways/ new one is all mine. Old one still works but it's sad.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie L Utscha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Let’s face it. The Bamix is expensive. But, it is totally awesome. I went through 2 Thundersticks, which I now realize are knockoffs of the Bamix, before shelling out for the real thing. There’s nothing quite like it. It whips 1/2 a cup of skim milk into a cup and a half of low calorie alternative to whipped cream in about a minute. Nothing else I’ve tried can do that. I don’t want to be without it now that I have it. Super easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop Looking, you found the best Blender Ever
customer_reviews.text: Stop your search. This industrial blender is Hands Down the best stick blender EVER. No mess, no splatter, makes quick easy work if all blending from whipping egg whites to mixing chunky butternut squash into a smooth soup, to quick AM protein smoothie made in the cup it will be enjoyed in.
customer_reviews.author: Erik C Stabell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had chance to really use it yet but what little I have I like it a lot. I had one before that was bought in 1989 and really loved it but the switch broke and no one could repair it. Was different than the present switches. Have ordered the processor attachments also.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: We received a replacement and its been awesome since then
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for a year, plastic holster broke after 4 months. We received a replacement and its been awesome since then.
customer_reviews.author: LARI

customer_reviews.title: Easy, fast, healthy breakfast shakes even my 10-yr can make herself
customer_reviews.text: Bought it after seeing a demonstration in the store. Use it every day to make healthy breakfast shakes. Even the 10-year old can use it safely. Have been very impressed by the mixer's quality and easy of use. Clean-up is a breeze and started buying the accessories. While this is more expensive than the ones you see in the store, it is definitely worth it!! We are giving it quite a work-out and are thrilled with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HerouxFamily

customer_reviews.title: It still works fine but was beginning to heat up a little so ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Bamix to replace the one I purchased at a Home & Garden show in 1985! It still works fine but was beginning to heat up a little so I ordered this one. Have not been disappointed. It seems more powerful than my old Bamix but my old one is only semi-retired.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: I love this Blender much more than my havy Wolfgang Puetz ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this Blender much more than my havy Wolfgang Puetz blender ,which is very good too and with more Accesories and absolutely much ,much better than my Cuisineart ,which is worth nothing. Even Oster is better than Cuisinart.I dont like short life products made in China and I am happy to have now a Blender made in Suisse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few immersion blenders and this one feels like a tank, indestructible. I luv the stand, I don't have to mount it to the wall as it is stable enough to leave on the counter. I look forward to making my own spice blends.
customer_reviews.author: Mary107

customer_reviews.title: Best Handblender!!
customer_reviews.text: I checked this out on the Internet and I read a lot of good reviews on it and bought it. Very good quality material and heavy duty. Should last a lifetime. You won't be sorry if you buy this. Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H

customer_reviews.title: the best!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is like Bamix! I tried to cook almost everything with it: smoothies, cakes, juice, humus etc. The only thing that was unsuccessful until now is tehini paste. I hope my bamix will serve us for the next generations.
customer_reviews.author: Rina Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: I have my old friend back in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased a Bamix back in the 80's at The Tulsa State Fair. It gave out a few years back. Glad I found this one on Amazon. It's all that I remember. Best hand held mixer on the market.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hauxwell

customer_reviews.title: The best! I was so happy to have found this ...
customer_reviews.text: The best! I was so happy to have found this tool, after missing my old one, which was an ESGE blender from Switzerland. None of the ones that I bought to replace it was as good and as close to the "original" as this one.
customer_reviews.author: UVG

customer_reviews.title: I have had one for many years in the Netherlands ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had one for many years in the Netherlands, now that I moved here there is no other I wanted. I had to get a new one for 110 volts. This is professional stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Andrej Bolkovic

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase of my barmix m150 good packaging everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with purchase of my barmix m150 good packaging everything was there. Grinder works fine so far the unit is working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: shalveen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we had one and used it for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ramer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. I mainly use it for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: bought this after reading so many raving reviews and comparing to others. Great buy. I mainly use it for smoothies. For an immersion blender, its damn good.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: except make me a good cook.
customer_reviews.text: It does everything the well . . . except make me a good cook.
customer_reviews.author: David Urion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: With this one no longer needs a food processer, blender, coffee grinder, and several other items.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bodi

customer_reviews.title: I love it. You just need to be patient and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. You just need to be patient and read the details on the attachments. It can be a little intimidating but if you follow through and be patient, you will love this. Just understand which blades work with your application. I made a chipotle butternut squash soup and and a poblano corn chowder with shrimp and used the immersion blender for thickness and it worked really well. It's a little pricey but well worth it.....
customer_reviews.author: N. Hire

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, so easy to use and clean up.Worth every penny...
customer_reviews.author: Kathy McClain

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Works great so far. Crushes ice, whips non fat milk (and soy milk) into foam. I'm worried about losing the tiny blade though.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps "breaking"  I guess it needs regular lubing that I cannot keep up with.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mixer for my business. I make a lot of crepe batter, but it has stopped working for me twice now. The first time I sent it in to local service center provided by Bamix, they lubed it and found nothing wrong with it. I guess I'm still having the same problem, but I don't think this should be happening. It was expensive and even the mixing power didnt stand up to my other calphalon, which I cannot find anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L. Smith

product_meta.title: Bamix M150 DeLuxe Immersion Hand Blender – Black – 3 Stainless Steel Interchangeable Blades – 50W 120V 60Hz with US-plug – Includes 3 Blades, Dry Grinder, Table Stand, and Recipe Booklet
feature_bullets: HANDBUILT IN SWITZERLAND: Whether you are a professional chef or home cook, our hand blender will get any cooking job done. Swiss made, our blender includes 3 interchangeable blades, a dry grinder, and a table stand for easy storage.

3 INTERCHANGEABLE BLADES: With an aerating, blending, and chopping blade, you get the multifunctionality of multiple kitchen appliances all in one. Create a perfect vortex to draw food into blades for efficient mixing then run under water for easy cleaning.

POWERFUL AND PRECISE: A powerful 150-watt A/C motor keeps constant, precise speed under heavy loads. With 2 speeds (9,000 RPM and 12,000 RPM), a push button control for continuous or pulse actions, and an ergonomic handle, our blender maintains efficient pulses with less vibration and noise.

MULTIPLE USES: Get fast and efficient mixing with our 13.5-inch blender made with PA6 safety rated nylon and chromated brass. Heat resistant with a high torque, you can submerge our blender shaft in a variety of foods and even boiling liquids. The blender is fully sealed so it can be submerged to seam below speed controls (immersion depth is 8.6").
5 YEAR WARRANTY: Get ultimate durability and easy handling with our made to last hand blender. Save time and money with a reliable purchase that gives you a 5-year warranty for ultimate satisfaction.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars99 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
